name: Skill at Time
description:
Mario and his beloved were relaxing in nature and nothing foreshadowed trouble, but one day there was a nuclear explosion and people changed, and their frying pan went crazy.
Now they will have to fight off hordes of hungry zombies that hunt for Mario's love, and his bullets can only bounce off the crazy frying pan.

Skill at Time is a 2D shooter game where the player shoots down hordes of zombies using a flying skillet and his dexterity. Copters with bombs fly around, and the player needs to dodge the pans, which land and increase with each passing world.

Features of the game:

- PSYCHEDELIC!
- Nice visual style
- Dynamic music
- The complexity
